# ui-input-group-addon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                      | Type                                    | Default          |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------- | ---------------- |
| `align`     | `align`     | Alignment of the addon (inline-start = left, inline-end = right) | `"inline-end" \| "inline-start"`        | `'inline-start'` |
| `clickable` | `clickable` | Whether to render as a clickable button                          | `boolean`                               | `false`          |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | Whether the addon is disabled (when clickable)                   | `boolean`                               | `false`          |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | Visual variant of the addon                                      | `"default" \| "muted" \| "transparent"` | `'default'`      |
